      • login

        public User login​(java.lang.String cpr,
                  java.lang.String password)
        Method to log a user in to the system. Throws exceptions if the user is already logged in, the CPR is not registered or the CPR/password combination does not match.
        Specified by:
        login in interface ServerUserModel
        Parameters:
        cpr - The CPR the user is trying to log in with.
        password - The password the user is trying to log in with.
        Returns:
        The user object that has the given CPR.

      • editUserInformation

        public User editUserInformation​(User user,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String firstName,
                                java.lang.String middleName,
                                java.lang.String lastName,
                                java.lang.String phone,
                                java.lang.String email,
                                java.lang.String street,
                                java.lang.String number,
                                int zip)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method to modify a user's personal data.
        Specified by:
        editUserInformation in interface ServerUserModel
        Parameters:
        user - The user whose data will be changed.
        password - The user's new password.
        firstName - The user's new first name.
        middleName - The user's new middle name, if any.
        lastName - The user's new last name.
        phone - The user's new phone.
        email - The user's new email.
        street - The user's new street address.
        number - The user's new street number.
        zip - The user's new zip code.
        Returns:
        The modified user object.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Throws a remote exception if any errors occur in the database.

        Method to create and add a new frequently asked question to the system.
        Specified by:
        addFAQ in interface ServerFAQModel
        Parameters:
        question - The actual question of the FAQ.
        answer - The answer to the given question.
        category - The category the FAQ belongs to.
        creator - The administrator who is creating the FAQ.

        java.rmi.RemoteException - Throws a remote exception if any errors occur in the database.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(Patient patient,
                        java.lang.String message,
                        Administrator administrator)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method to add a given message to a patient's chat log.
        Specified by:
        sendMessage in interface ServerMessageModel
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient whose chat log the message is to be added to.
        message - The string representation of the message that was sent.
        administrator - The administrator that sent the message. If 'null', the patient sent the message.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Throws a remote exception if any errors occur in the database.
